description: driven by a passion for finding innovative solutions to everyday problems. In the fast-paced world of technology, I thrive on the challenges that come with creating cutting-edge solutions

projects.KomKomApp: Developed a high-performance landing page for a fintech mobile app using Drupal, ensuring a seamless user experience and optimized SEO. Implemented responsive design, fast-loading components, and best practices for search engine visibility to drive user engagement and conversions.
projects.Galsenfit: Integrated the Paydunya payment gateway into a Shopify shop to automate payment processing, developed a TypeScript/Node.js backend to manage orders and transactions, and implemented real-time payment tracking using GraphQL.
projects.Jumper Logistique: Built a logistics platform with Next.js for fast, SEO-friendly frontend performance and Supabase as a backend for real-time shipment tracking and customer data management. Developed a custom admin dashboard for managing shipments, updating statuses, and handling customer inquiries efficiently.
projects.Yoo Agility: Modernized a static website by implementing Drupal CMS with JSON API as a headless backend and migrating the frontend from Gatsby to Next.js. Achieved a 40% improvement in load times, enhanced SEO via server-side rendering, and streamlined content management with custom Drupal modules and API integration. Additionally, integrated the Paydunya payment gateway to enable secure online transactions for training course purchases.
projects.DRH&MOI: Developed a full-stack HR platform using React, Appwrite, and Node.js, enabling employees to purchase equipment (phones, laptops, etc.) through long-term payment plans. Implemented role-based authentication, real-time data synchronization, and secure payment processing. Designed a scalable backend with Appwrite for authentication, database management, and storage, while leveraging React for a responsive and dynamic user interface.
